doc:
Antoine Vitez https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Antoine_Vitez 0 Antoine Vitez (20 December 1930 – 30 April 1990) was a French actor, director, and poet. He became a central character and influence on the French theater in the post-war period, especially in the technique of teaching drama. He was also translator of Chekhov, Vladimir Mayakovsky and Mikhail Sholokhov. Antoine_Vitez ( 20_December_1930 – 30_April_1990 ) was a_French_actor , director , and poet . He became a_central_character_and_influence on the_French_theater in the_post-war_period , especially in the_technique of teaching_drama . He was also translator of Chekhov , Vladimir_Mayakovsky and Mikhail_Sholokhov .
